website_summaries.verdict: The Sony MDR-XB650BT is a comfortable Bluetooth headphone pair that excels at delivering seriously intense bass.
pros: No distortion at top volume levels
cons: Bass is way too dialed-up to be accurate
No way to listen passively via an audio cable

customer_reviews.title: BREAKS EASY
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I’ve had because I like the sound quality and battery life. Second pair I’ve had break. In the same spot. I’ve had these for less than three months, and just putting them ON causes the support to break. Keep in mind since I’ve had another pair break I’ve been super careful with these. I wasn’t power fisting my head into them, just placing them on and they broke. And the cheap plastic can’t be glued by gorilla glue either. So now I have to get another pair of headphones, and I can tell you they won’t be these.
customer_reviews.author: Reading

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but extreamly breakable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset, and was quite pleased... until it broke after less than a year. The connection point for the earpiece on one side cracked, and the headset no longer sat on on my head comfortably. I thought I must have sat on them or something, and after several unsuccessful attempts to use tape or glue to hold it together, I ended up buying a second headset. ... which fell apart on me this morning. No mistake, I definitely did not sit on them this time. The connection point for one of the earpieces just fell apart after 4 months. So yes, nice sound, but quite breakable, and I will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: finajk

customer_reviews.title: Sony's Headphones Are Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The sound of Sony's headphones are great. It's the construction that will make you pay more money for a better sounding and better constructed brand than Sony. I have spent a lot of money and time researching wireless headphones. Every time I buy a pair of Sony's wireless headphones the headphones crack at the part that connects the ear to the headband. No more Sony. No more.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Theyyyyy're Great!!
customer_reviews.text: These have become my go to headphones for the vast majority of my listening needs. They are awesome. I usually don't like on ear headphones but I have the 950bt and these and I honestly prefer the 650s. The sound is MUCH more balanced in my opinion but still on the bass heavy side obviously. If you want to rattle whatever you've got going on between your ears get the 950bt. If you want super light weight headphones that sound great and have very long battery life then the 650s are better. They're more compact so it's not a chore to carry around but still incredibly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ok here it goes cuz after I unwrapped this item tht I juz got today I cldnt wait to hear them because they’re Sony right? Well oh man I cldnt believe my ears .... the sound the bass is amazing!!!! I can’t tell u how much money I’ve wasted on ear phones... Spend the money sometimes u juz hav to spend the money if u want quality. They paired immediately, they were somewhat charged when I got them I had to charge them more for them to come on.... AND they juz stopped working .... they no longer worked. I even left them to charge the whole night AND nothin the next day .... I’m returning them ....
customer_reviews.author: annette hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones, cheap build, planned obsolecense
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were nice - while they lasted. After a little over one year of moderate use the bearing which connects the main earpiece to the headband snapped off. This appears to be a VERY common issue with these headphones. After opening up the headphones I found the culprit (see photo). Sony has actually cut a smooth notch into the plastic(!!!) bearing that supports the earpiece. It's incredible that this critical piece would be made of plastic (and purposefully notched) in such an expensive product. This seems to be a case of planned obsolescence, and I can not recommend buying these headphones for even light to moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam

customer_reviews.title: Product is good, but stopped working after 9 months of use
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good, but it stopped working after 9 months. I looked at their warranty, 90-days labor, 1 yr parts. If it stopped working, you fix it and I have to pay for the labor? Are you kidding me? No wonder everyone just buy cheap Chinese brands and throw them away when they break. [Update] Contacted Sony and as it was under warranty, I sent it back free of charge and they sent back new one. Changed the rating to four stars - can’t give five as it broke in 9 mo. But overall it’s good quality. Hope Sony continues to make good products and more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality,Made with cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and battery life is fantastic. Best on the market. Now the Cheap plastic used will last about 6 months. Then it will break. Like mine did, ( see picture) Placed these on my head and they broke. Thus Leaving you with a broken headset. Unless you are a magician and can magically fix these. These are toast. I would suggest try something different then these POS. I just flushed 100.00 right down the crapper. NOT WORTH THE PRICE FOR CHEAP PLASTIC. DO NOT BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy O'dell

customer_reviews.title: I really hope I just got a bad head set because this is not cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought a month ago. Worked ok. A little hard to set up Bluetooth connection, which is unusual. Now I got a new phone and it will not pair AT ALL. I tried calling the support line and the guy hung up. I really hope I just got a bad head set because this is not cool. I won’t but Sony again if it’s going to be like this.
customer_reviews.author: jbwatergirl

customer_reviews.title: Okay wireless headphones, good sound quality but....
customer_reviews.text: These are solid headphones sound wise. But what I don't like about them are: - The design. If I wear them out, it looks like I'm supposed to DJ somewhere. Not a good look at the coffee shop. - The blinking light. The blinking light!!!! When it's on, it flashes a blue light and if you're somewhere dark (like an airplane, or if you're watching something in your bedroom with them on while your wife is fast asleep) the flashing light is very noticeable and unnecessary. - It is comfortable... but not absolutely comfortable. I've tried on beats solo or bose headphones and those are a lot more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Imran A Khan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for urban life. Not so great for the gym.
customer_reviews.text: I live and work in noisy urban areas. This headphone creates a comfortable headspace. Nearly always loud enough to isolate myself. Battery last a long time and is easy to charge. I originally bought these for the gym. They are a great fit, snug and secure. I have bigger head and neck however. Problem: when I start sweating they get really gross. They perform well even as I swear. But the band and ear pads collect sweat and cleaning is very difficult. Add on: I bought these in March. It is now Sept. These headphones are still great. One additional problem. The seam on inner edge of ear pad split. I wish I had a way to repair it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do These Work??
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are supposedly refurbished from the factory and I had high hopes for them. I confess my inexperience with Bluetooth devices, but how hard can it be? As of this date I have been TOTALLY unable to get these to work with my phone, laptop, or television. I do not know if it is me or the headphones, but the bottom line is that they are not working for me. (Yes, I read the owner's manual.)
customer_reviews.author: G. Baggett

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love..love..love it!! I got this from the treasure truck and I couldn't be more pleased! I got it to use while working out, but got an exrra surprise when I realized it can be used to talk on my cell phone...OMG! It's comfortable, great sounding, and has wonderful noise reduction. I've been told by several people that I sound very clear when talking. I purchased it on 9/9 and TODAY is the 1st time I've charged it since the initial charge. I talk with it everyday for at least 5 hours. I would certainly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: sdb

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I got these that I didn’t even charge them before heading out to mow the yard, and it turns out I didn’t need to. The battery lasted for 2 WEEKS before they needed a charge. I’ve had them for about 7 months and have had to charge them 5 times. I use them on average about 15-20 hours a week. I don’t know what kind of battery is in these, but it’s way better than the battery in any iPhone. The sound is fine for me, but I’m not an audiophile. The noise cancelling works well. I can’t hear the weed eater over the headphones. They’re very well made. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dehart

customer_reviews.title: amz warehouse was a great deal
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these by now, for my wife and I, and they the sound is actually really good. All of them that I have bought was from the amazon warehouse deals, and for that discounted price the product has been amazing. I don't know if i would pay full price, but for the discount, these have been amazing. The sound cancelling is "passive" which I think means that the cushions just muffle outside sounds well. I will say that I would have preferred active noise cancelling, but it does muffle out other noises pretty good. The price is what got me, and the quality for the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Initials

customer_reviews.title: Above Par
customer_reviews.text: I had yet to find a pair of bluetooth headphones that matched my old $15.99 pair of line-in Phillips until now...and I've tried many pairs. I sometimes wear these to the gym when I'm not doing any exercises where I have to lay flat, and they stay on just fine and are comfortable to wear. They paired immediately and unlike other bluetooth headphones, do not cut out-and-in intermittently. The battery life is good. While these are not noise cancelling, they do dim out the normal city sounds. The volume max is perfect for me and the sound quality is well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: PMG

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine for How I Use It
customer_reviews.text: First, I am not an audiophile, so when I say the sound quality is good, take that with a grain of salt. I mainly use the headphones to listen to YouTube videos and to my untrained ears the sound is quite good. I can attest to the durability since I have dropped them to a ceramic tile floor a couple of times and they seem no worse for the wear. The bluetooth feature always seems to connect reliably to my computer and has a reasonable range. I typically go several days of regular usage before having to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: JWS

customer_reviews.title: Low quality material. Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I got mine a year ago and from looking at it I knew that it is going to break from rotating points.The points that are subject to sheer stress needed to be made of metal but they are plastic and will break much sooner than the electronic parts would go bad. Save yourself some money and buy something more expensive but more quality.
customer_reviews.author: behshad

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient. Didn't like the sound.
customer_reviews.text: Very muddy sound for the price. I don't know if my Audio-technica athm50x spoiled me but these don't compare with those. Most people would think these sound great I think but I'm pretty picky, and I was expecting a lot better definition for this price. The functionality of these however is awesome! Wish they were usb-c, though. BEWARE: the Bluetooth forward/reverse buttons on the headphones were working fine on my pixel 1 until I upgraded to Android Oreo. Don't know if that can be fixed. I ended up returning mostly because of the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Atizzle

customer_reviews.title: SOLID Base!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT sound. Base is on point. Was considering an alternative to getting BEATS. LOVE THIS SOUND QUALITY. Had a pair for ON ear JBLs. Ratings were good but sound was.. hollow. NOT with these SONY. Two issues/nit to pick: 1) these are BIG... not overly big; but that stand out on your head. Would like something a bit sleeker/tapered. 2) the position of the BT indicator light... ANNOYING! I wear glasses. and the flashing blue light keeps popping up in my peripheral. not the end of the world. Just annoying to see when your just walking around or reading on the bus. Id buy them again. Thinking about gift a pair to my sister.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easily Broken
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and bass are really good but, unfortunately, they are falling apart after a little less than a year of daily use. The plastic part connecting the ear piece the the headband has broken off in sections and is only connected by a thin strip of plastic at this point. They have great sound quality but I definitely will not be purchasing these again due to their fragility.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was good, however, they were only able to be charged once. Any other attempts to charge failed. Attempted plugging into a MacBook Pro, an iMac and a Windows desktop computer and they never charged. I tried USB power adaptors as well and none of them did the trick either, so I ended up returning them and going with Klipsch headphones, which honestly sound significantly nicer, minus the extra bass, which is OK by me.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Solid battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I use these everywhere from the gym to when I walk around the house. I can be in my room and still hear what's playing on my computer about 25+ feet away and it blocks out just about every other sound. The initial Bluetooth setup required some google searching but after that, it connects very easily. Very easy to use with the play, pause, forward, backward, volume, battery check options. I've charged it once in the last 2-3 weeks and I use it daily and there's still battery left.
customer_reviews.author: Leila Celestin

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They are lightweight, not bulky on my ears, don't make my ears sore and the sound is great for the price point. I will use these primarily for air travel and they seem to block out noise even though they are not noise canceling. My needs were more for size and convenience, and price. I didn't want bulky headphones and didn't want to spend money on the the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: bits1028

customer_reviews.title: On the ear! Not over the ear!
customer_reviews.text: Always being a Sony fan I purchased these because I thought they were over the ear headphones. No where in the description does it say they are “on ear” headphones until you read the comparison section and then you need to realize these headphones are model number MDRXB650BT which looks exactly like the over the ear model number XB950B1. I kinda feel duped by Sony as I was under the impression these were over the ear but $20 less. I’m sure they sound great but on the ear headphones don’t stay put during rigorous activities such as working out or running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones...maybe a little bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these headphones for a few days now. The sound quality is good although it is a tad bit bass-y. I like the convenience of not wires, but wish there was an option to add a plug-in cable. So far, I have used them with two PCs, an iPhone, an IPad, and an Android phone without any problems. Connecting is easy. However, you can not use the headphones while they are plugged into a power source. Charging the headphones disconnects the Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Merideth

customer_reviews.title: Good light weight headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones for the price. If you're the average Joe and not an audiophile you'll be happy with the sound. I have a pair of Parrot Zik wireless headphones but I needed a pair of wireless headphones that were lighter in weight, didn't make me sweat even more in the summer heat, and I wouldn't mind my preteen daughters borrowing. This fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: August Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Stopped functioning after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these headphones and was a exicted to invest my money on these but just 3 months after my purchase the headphones just died. They were working one minute and 30 mins later nothing. And yes, the battery life was fine because I had just checked it. Won’t turn on, so you can’t really do anything beyond that. I tired the reset option and there was some sound and then nothing again. I’m really disappoint because the sound quality was great, battery life awesome, and just overall great design (no headaches after wearing for a long time). But now I’m out over $60 with a pair of headphones that are useless to me
customer_reviews.author: S. Gunasekera

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these headphones for less than a year and have had to have them replaced TWICE due to the poor design on the earpiece. My son had had his replaced, my coworker, and my BF. Now Sony doesn’t even have black ones to make replacements. They are sending out blue ones. What gives???! I think if everyone gives them a one star, MAYBE they might do right by their customers. Or maybe we should all just sue them.
customer_reviews.author: Ros Grizzard

customer_reviews.title: Great. But don't last long
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in February for my son but they have broken now and my son can't use them without having problems with the sound going out in one or both sides. They sounded amazing and I thought they would last much longer as most of my other Sony products have. I purchased two of these and the other one is ok yet but has only been used a week or two so far.
customer_reviews.author: s. dude

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 3 months, after 2' fall onto carpeted floor
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally fumbled and dropped these from a seated position onto a carpeted floor. No force other than gravity, and the plastic backing holding the actual ear pieces to the band snapped off. Sound still plays, but the ear pieces just dangle from the band, rending the headphones unwearable and thus unusable. A little googling shows that this is a common issue with these and other Sony headphones. Sony doesn't offer replacement parts for the broken backing pieces. Disappointed that a $78 product could be rendered useless so easily. Will not buy another pair of Sony headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: These last forever and I seemingly never have to charge them. I have never used them for anything athletic (running, indoor bike, weight training), but they do fit nicely and work well for just sitting around listening to whatever. Only downside is that they do start to irritate my ears after about 1.5 hours of wear.
customer_reviews.author: John Kettering

customer_reviews.title: top of the line- after two years battery drains considerably fast
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've had these for about three days. The sound is perfect. I tried several headsets prior to these and did not really measure up. Currently I am testing the endurance of the battery and it's holding up as described. I recommend these highly. UPDATE: After ~ two years of regular use, the battery does not last too long. Five hours top.
customer_reviews.author: Alex-Biker

customer_reviews.title: These may very well be my favorite Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: These may very well be my favorite Bluetooth headphones. I had the extra bass bigger version of these but those broke. You have to be careful with the plastic around the ear cups because they can break. But that's the only reason these aren't five stars. They have superb connectivity, battery life, and sound quality. The colors are attractive without being gaudy and I personally enjoy the emphasis on bass. Not appropriate for exercise but if I'm grocery shopping or cleaning around the house, I've got these on.
customer_reviews.author: B2

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and no hassle as it connects via ...
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and no hassle as it connects via bluetooth as soon as you push the button on. I am editing my review after we used the product for three months. The part connecting the swivel joint broke off and now the speaker is hanging down by the wiring. I never thought that a sturdy looking product is swirling around a flimsy joining piece. I do not recommend buying this product under this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Samira Barghouthi

customer_reviews.title: Monsterious BASS great sound
customer_reviews.text: If you love BASS you'll love this headphones. It gives you so much bass you'll get a concussion even on the lowest volume setting. For me its toooooo much as I dont want to go deaf. I have to use an equalizer to reduce the bass. But it has great quality sound with monsterious bass. Feels well made controls are good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Bass is too muddy and boomy
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these left much to be desired. The bass is ridiculous! It's too boomy and muddy. Fortunately I was able to download a graphic equalizer app to tone it down, and at least it's better now. I'm used to accurate sound reproduction from my wired Sennheiser and Sony headphones that don't have this silly bass ruiner, I mean boost.
customer_reviews.author: Acer

customer_reviews.title: decent.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife. Catch a sale and they are very good value for the money for the segment. In my experience with Sony headphones the lineup usually starts cheap and bad, price increases and so does quality, and then you hit a plateau where the price goes up and the quality really doesn't until you are spending a LOT of money. At that point the quality goes up, but you wind up asking if it is worth it. If you don't need noise canceling, these are the sweet spot. Decent sound, good battery life, nice fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: They where not kidding.. AMAZING bass headphones
customer_reviews.text: They weren’t lying when they said the bass on these headphones stound out.. If your into HipHop,Rap,EDM and dance music then these headphones would be perfect for you. As a rock fan it was adding a little too much bass for my liking. I can’t say anything bad, they sound great otherwise and if your looking for that low end and want that vibration In your head then these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: The headphones are fine until...
customer_reviews.text: I have not had any problem with the performance of these headphones. My big issue is the quality of the product and Sony's support. The little piece of plastic connecting the earpiece to the rest of the headphones broke when I put them on. Sony's support will not cover the problem because it is physical damage. Sony needs to invest an extra .25 and make the plastic sturdier or cover failures like this. The headphones cost over $120. I would understand if I dropped them. The part broke when I put the headphones on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Smetana

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, and recipient was really impressed and asked if they were expensive (lol) Beautiful headphones. The color is great, construction sturdy and the bass is good. Worth the price. My only concern is that it scratches really easily. It doesn’t impair the sound quality but I was hoping the color wouldn’t scratch or flake so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I like bass in my headphones, so I thought this set would be better, especially since it's a Sony. However, the bass is muffled and the treble is not especially clear. My MPOW H12 headphones are superior, with deep bass and clear treble resulting in a perfectly balanced sound quality. Another drawback is that these Sony headphones do not have wired connection capability.
customer_reviews.author: rhuffman

customer_reviews.title: Bad connector. Does not charge. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. Charger stopped working. phones is dead. The charger connection was loose when I got it. connector came apart. I glued it together and it worked for a bit but now it doesn’t charge anymore. I’ve emailed the seller about this and no response. Once again this is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Crash32

customer_reviews.title: The bass is pretty full, and overall range is balanced.
customer_reviews.text: Main concern was the sound quality, and there it's really good for relatively inexpensive. The bass is pretty full, and overall range seems pretty balanced, The highs aren't hissy like many bluetooth headphones I've heard in the past. Just purchased, but needs to break in to comment on how comfortable they are, but the setup was pretty simple as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Hellum

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head and these headphones really irritated my ears, but I figured they'd eventually have more give if I kept wearing them, but they broke, I had them in a backpack, along with some other things and a bag of potato chips. The chips were fine but the headphones were broken, they're very bulky, they don't fold away. The sound quality and battery level are both very good though. These are too much money, get the insurance
customer_reviews.author: Alec White

customer_reviews.title: Sony always makes great headphones. Well actually
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal headphones! Sony always makes great headphones. Well actually, not necessarily their cheaper models. I bought another pair of on-ear Bluetooth headphones and there is no comparison. These sound so full and deep, compared to the other set. They also feel much more durable. Although I would like the option to turn the extra bass option off, I do love how it sounds. I'm glad I went with this model. The noise cancellation is just enough for the office when I need to concentrate and get some serious work done. Thank you, Sony!
customer_reviews.author: Wass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: The MDRXB650BT/B headphones are fantastic! They sound excellent. Great bass, simple controls, comfy and the BT pairing is easy. Phone calls are clear on both ends. There's not a bad thing to say about these headphones. Oh, and they passively cancel external noise too. For $70-80 bucks why spend 3 times as much on other brands/models. Sony's reputation as a leader in mobile technology is coming back.
customer_reviews.author: Christy & Tyler Barwick

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone, very bad microphone
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these headphones for over a year, and I really like them. But, it is very annoying to use them to make phone calls. The microphone captures every noise surrounding you so your voice ends up sounding very faint for the person on the other side of the call. I have even decided to disconnect the headphone when receiving a call. Great headphone for music listening, very clear sound, nice bass, a little opaque on highs -but still good-, but regarding call quality, thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, good quality, but not so great sound cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, very good sound quality, and very convenient: just don't expect the noise cancellation to be anywhere near as good as the high-end headphones like those from Bose and a few others. If noise-cancellation IS your #1 concern, then I'd recommend you shell out for the higher-end headsets, but if you just want to listen to music and movies (or do conference calls, like I do) without disturbing others, these do an excellent job.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Perkison

customer_reviews.title: Solid Phones
customer_reviews.text: Good phones for the price, good quality sound. Light aluminum frame that you can wear for a long time. My only gripe was it took a factory reset (hold play and power button 7 seconds) and 4 attempts turning my bluetooth on and off before it finally paired with my iphone, was literally looking for the box to ship it back when it finally paired...
customer_reviews.author: awGuru

customer_reviews.title: I go for weeks before having to recharge.
customer_reviews.text: I go for weeks before having to recharge. I fall asleep in them sometimes. I haven't had them break. I'm not an audiophile, I'm more about the bass. To me it sounds okay. They aren't Bose or Dr. Drey Beats, so I don't expect them to be superior. But they are good for what they are. I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: these are a great sounding headphone. they're comfortable to the ears and head. my only complain is the joints where the head phones turn; they got weak on me after about a year or so. that's when the broke leave me with out a solid fit to the head. the sound and connectivity was still strong. overall not bad i just wish for a stronger joint on the headphones
customer_reviews.author: Maleek M.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor range
customer_reviews.text: Sound is excellent but you can only get about 20 feet from your phone with these before they disconnect. I had a pair of these that I bought from Best Buy about a year ago and they worked perfect. Long distance range and quality sound but these are pretty crappy compared to them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy M.

customer_reviews.title: i like them, they look great
customer_reviews.text: i like them, they look great, the battery life is good, the sound quality is fine too. but the ear cups are small, so they press down on my ears and hurt if I am using them long, say an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine, uncomfortable after extended use.
customer_reviews.text: Solid sound, but can be uncomfortable after wearing for extended periods of time. I often have to take them off because they don't fit my ears quite right and can become painful. I thought the band would "loosen" after time, but it's still pretty tight and uncomfortable. I've tried to find alternate cushions for the ear buds but no luck. They do not seem to be removable.
customer_reviews.author: rv

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: I wish i can adjust the bass o at least turn it off. Sounds good but sometimes he bass is too much and you cannot adjust which levels of bass. So I want more 20hz to 200hz, but the unit adds more 500hz to 1000hz and sometimes that could give music a muffled sound.
customer_reviews.author: GAP

customer_reviews.title: As a bass lover, the sound is great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased these! It's my first time using Bluetooth headphones and I appreciate the quality for the price. I'm a bass lover and this really gives me what I want. The few problems I face is the application priorities. I understand these are headphones suited for various things other than gaming, however I wish I could use my mic in a different application why listening to the sounds in another (i.e. discord for mic, overwatch for sound). Although, a simple fix is to simply purchase gaming headsets for those purposes. Other than that, I love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Kianna

customer_reviews.title: Stunning battery life - updated because they broke
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for 2 months and have charged them once for like an hour, and once over night (so not even 2 full charges). I use them every day on my commute. Great sound, too. the 4 stars on material quality is that they feel a little flimsy, but that's honestly nitpicking. I'd order again in a heartbeat. UPDATE: Well, I was right about the material being flimsy, they broke already. Was simply taking them off one morning and the hinge snapped. Will NOT be purchasing Sony headphones in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jalina

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, lightweight, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great bass, lightweight, charge lasts a good while. Very comfortable on the ears. I use these every day. Call quality is great as well if you want to make calls on these. I wanted the Bose ones but didn't want to shell out all the money. This was a great alternative and I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: linda williams

customer_reviews.title: Never Recharged, Now Dead
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, mine worked out of the box, but never once recharged no matter how long they were plugged in (even after swapping USB cables, chargers, power sources, etc.). Effectively dead now after the first few hours of use
customer_reviews.author: Keyan Reid

customer_reviews.title: Would opt for the 950bt.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for the money. I bought these for my partner, but she doesnt like anything bulky on her ears so she uses buds. I havent noticed the noise cancelling, because I have not been around noisy environments. As to comfort I prefer the 950bt's. They are more comfortable and actually fold smaller as the headband is hinged.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mainly for when I travel on a plane so I haven't used them yet for an extended period of time. I did sync it with my phone and listened to a few songs. They work great and the sound is really good. I look forward to using them on an extended period when I travel to Greece this summer. If there is any problems I'll be sure to update my review after the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gnagi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Battery, Nice sound, Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: I use this to listen to language-learning recordings. Sound quality is great, and the battery life blows me away. I charged it when it came, 10 days ago, and have used it about an hour a day since, and still going strong. I won’t be surprised if it makes its “thirty-hour” claim, but even if it falls a little short, the fit is pretty good, and the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: 84_momof3terrificsons

customer_reviews.title: Really cheap construction.
customer_reviews.text: I would expect Sony to do better than this. The band began to crack in many places a few months after I bought the headsets. The pictures show what I had to do to hold them together. Also, the volume in the right side is much lower than the left.
customer_reviews.author: Geepa

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and Price. Some Durability issues, but only if you plan on working out/traveling with them.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, and I used them almost everyday, from when I bought them just about a year ago to a few days ago...when one of the heads popped off the band. It's impossible to put the ear muff back on as it seems something plastic on the swivel joint broke off. I think these were great but I am a little upset at the durability. However, if you are not going to be doing a whole not fo activities with these, they offer great sound at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Myles Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Love Bass Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this product 5 stars!!! BUT I received this product and noticed a small ticking in the right speaker. Sounds as if something is loose inside bouncing around when the bass is active. It is small but EXTREMELY noticable and annoying. It defeats the whole purpose of the headphones. How am I supposed to enjoy the VERY satisfying bass if it’s always accompanied by this small ticking? I’m going to talk to support and see what they can do because I’m very dissapoimted since I was looking forward to using these. I’m a bass addict and this ticking ruins the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones ,however when the arrived they had greasy fingerprints on them and some sort of white powder on them (maybe some type of food). Also no charging cord was included in the box and I believe the description stated it came with one. I'm not returning due to the fact that these are great headphones for the price (Amazon warehouse deal). But not happy at all with the condition these headphones arrived in.
customer_reviews.author: Mgillette

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones either for travel or around the house. They aren't active sound cancelling, but the ear cups block out enough of the airport sounds that I was able to enjoy my music or Netflix in peace. They are easy to charge, use, and adjust the volume as needed. The material of the ear cups is also extremely soft, which kept them comfortable, even after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 year of light use!
customer_reviews.text: I use these at my desk at work about every other day and they have never been used in an abusive way (stuffed in a bag, during exercise). The swivel joint on the left ear fell off today. I am not satisfied that the main movement component on the headset is made of plastic. The top band is metal and holds up fine, but not this plastic joint! I will not be buying another sony headset
customer_reviews.author: James Morton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect BASS and mid/high combo!!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are AMAZING. TOO MUCH BASS? That worried me when I purchased it. So many complaints about the bass being too much. Not even close! Those folks just hate bass period. If you like bass at all then you will love these. They are nowhere near overwhelming with bass and the mids and highs are great. Super comfy. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Better than my Beats by Dre...
customer_reviews.text: If these ever break on me, I'm buying another one! great value for great sound. I am completely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ash Bee

customer_reviews.title: I always see him wearing it which means that it is easy to charge and easy to find
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband and he loves it. I always see him wearing it which means that it is easy to charge and easy to find. The earphone part swivels flat so it’s easy to pack. Very pretty color blue. Sound quality is great too as I have borrowed it a few times. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: ITS A SONY!!
customer_reviews.text: the sound , the comfort, the easy Bluetooth connection.. did I mention the sound? it really is a nice headphones set..so far. I have not had any troubles with it yet and again it is a SONY. no more aftermarket or no name brands for me.. it is worth the extra few dollars and less hassle..
customer_reviews.author: jammers1

customer_reviews.title: You usually can't go wrong with Sony
customer_reviews.text: I got these from the warehouse deals for about 35 bucks. they are incredible! the battery lasts forever. the bass is really good is a little artificial but only slightly and it's Sony quality so it's very good. I was surprised how good they sounded. The ergonomics are okay could be better but no complaints everything works I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Fryer Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, but can break at anytime.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two pairs of similar headphones from Sony, and they are amazing. They have good battery life, they have amazing sound quality, etc. The only problem arises after a long time of use. They don't charge or turn on anymore. Both pairs of headphones have been heavily used but taken care of well. It is a common problem with Sony wireless headphones, according to the internet. If they figure out a way to fix the problem, I'd recommend these. But for now, since both my headphones died that way, I can't recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these. At first the prolonged wearing will hurt ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. At first the prolonged wearing will hurt your ears after about 30 minutes. But this was my first pair so I figured that this would happen. I've had them for some weeks now and the problem is gone. They sound amazing. While they aren't noice canceling, they do a great job of blocking out noise. It makes the usual 737 and the A320 family sound more like an A380! Can't tell I'm on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Sacrifices good sound for muddy 'Extra Bass'
customer_reviews.text: These headphone sacrifice good sound for muddy 'Extra Bass'... Everything sounds dull and lifeless, and the 'Extra Bass' seems to be the cause. There's no presence to the music. They are also not eyeglass friendly. After 10 minutes I have to rip them off. (the headphones) I would have returned them if I had paid full price, but I got them from the Treasure Truck for $45. They'll just be added to the 'red headed stepchild, pile of electronics.
customer_reviews.author: kavlito

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy - Extremely disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for my father last May before his heart surgery because I owned a pair and really liked them. However, all three pairs that we owned have broken in the same place. They are just barely out of the one-year warranty and Sony will not do anything to fix or replace them. I called their customer service and they said there is nothing they can do to replace or repair these headphones. I’ve spent over $300 on Sony headphones and cannot use any of them now. I will never buy them again. Look for a better brand with better customer service and quality. I am extremely disappointed with Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Good bass, quite wide sound stage, smooth sound. Only draw back is it can't fold, overall it is still a great Bluetooth headphones. I bought it at $78, if price goes down to around my purchased price again, I will buy another 2 more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Fernando Lée

customer_reviews.title: Sony Style on a budget
customer_reviews.text: This will definitely get the job done in terms of casual use quality. Don't expect these headphones to be perfect professional quality DJ headphones or home theater. They are perfect for when you are on a bus ride, doing homework, or just lounging on your couch after long day at work. They are comfortable and deliver the sound you need. In my opinion, they are excellent for individuals without a professionally trained ear.
customer_reviews.author: soynanyos

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth+Windows audio still doesn't work in 2019
customer_reviews.text: Works great when it works, but has a lot of connectivity problems to Windows 10. All the documentation from Sony and Windows and online can say is "reconnect" "reinstall" but the only advice I have is "don't buy Bluetooth audio to pair with a Windows computer". I've tried pairing this with my phone and it works great there.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Xtra Bass = Xtra Bad
customer_reviews.text: Build was nice after a slight break in however the Bass is muddy and overpowers the low treble and non-existent mids. I reviewed these on my Channel over a couple weeks and they were not a pleasant listen despite how pretty they look
customer_reviews.author: UtmostCoin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and sound but too heavy on my head ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and sound but too heavy on my head when wearing for more than 5 to 10 mins. These headphones I would consider definitely on the heavier side so be aware
customer_reviews.author: jamisonman

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Average
customer_reviews.text: When someone decided what the word average should mean they had these headphones in mind. They are not good, not bad. They are average. I think you can get a lot better sounding headphones for the price without having to spend the big money on something like Beats.
customer_reviews.author: StraightandHonest

customer_reviews.title: Teenage son loves the Bluetooth—no cord!
customer_reviews.text: Work well for my teenage son that is not a music lover. He uses them more for his gaming and videos. He charges them daily so he can’t attest to battery life. The only negative would be that sometimes during videos there is a sound delay. He wears them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jokoboco

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent Bluetooth headphones. My biggest fear was that I'd get some interference from other Bluetooth devices. Well, no interference at all. The sound quality was better than expected. For the price I got these at and for them to be an older model now, they are still very impressive. I let the sig-other borrow them for a day and now have to buy another pair. She said she is keeping them for herself now. The only thing is now do i buy another one of these or get the latest model (mdr-xb950) with optional 3.5mm jack....
customer_reviews.author: X.Ram

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, cheap mount.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent, base is heavy and clear. Battery life is amazing, i charge it maybe once a week and used it all day at work, every day. Bluetooth range is impressive and works through walls without issue. Going off sound quality and batery life alone these headphones are 5*, however, they have a major flaw... the plastic earphone mount is so cheap it easily breaks. My headphones had one earphone snap off after only light use and i am now forced to use them with only one earpiece working.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Schuck

customer_reviews.title: Sony Wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them everything about them does sound quality they are so comfortable thank you guys This product is awesome all The instructions came with it the Charger They are awesome and I would definitely buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This device failed, to an engineer that means broke, at the junction of the yoke and the earpiece swivel. We fixed it with some epoxy and it failed again at an adjacent joint. To my knowledge, it was never abused. The two failures occurred within days of each other. My guess is that we have an endemic design failure here.
customer_reviews.author: wGraves

customer_reviews.title: Great color and sound!
customer_reviews.text: I spotted a guy in the train wearing these and instantly fell in love. I have been a long time fan of Sony and the richness if the sound in their headphones. Only thing. It is very difficult to wear earrings with these headphones on. They put pressure on the post which digs into my skin. Find myself having to take off my earrings or bend my earlobes.
customer_reviews.author: Foreverfearless24

customer_reviews.title: Not built well.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent until they break. The sound quality excellent. I use for music and netflix. I have purchased two pair each break I the exact same spot. The are not misused or the kids. After the first pair, I use two hands to take off and put on.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki2001

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound quality but remember to use Aptx Bluetooth adaptor!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is fantastic! but remember to use an "Aptx" Bluetooth adaptor from your laptop/PC to enjoy the best effect. If you use just connect to a random Bluetooth device you won't get the best out of it! I first used in my phone (Samsung S8), and then PC with embedded Bluetooth transmitter, and finally PC with Aptx adaptor. Clearly the last one won in terms of both sound quality and bass!
customer_reviews.author: Ke Yan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is excellent! I charged these up a year ago and the battery is still good. I use them about once or twice a week but still holds it's charge well when sitting idle. Sound is fantastic! Great bass response and still has voice clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Holloway

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I owned
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give 5 stars for all but noise cancelation isn't that great , but overall one of the best wireless headsets I've ever owned . The NFC feature is super cool and allows to pair with my pixel phone within seconds it's brought into contact with. Charge lasts longer than I expected , very reasonable price I would say !! Overall it's great .
customer_reviews.author: Chandra V

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, not great for professional purposes.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are functional and comfortable, easy to connect. The charge is a little crappy (mine died the first day after charging them the recommended amount of time) and I - for some reason - was under the impression they would come with the option to use them with an audio jack (which they don't). So, If you're totally down with 100% bluetooth headphones, these are your guys. You just can't use them on a plane -_-
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, poor construction :-(
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The sound is awesome, good frequency response, impressive battery life. Cons: You can only charge it via the computer USB, not a wall block. It isn't snug enough for me and slips off easily while moving around normally. The most annoying attribute is a strange tinging sound which comes from the speakers when you touch them or just walk around with the headphones on and turned off (while you have music playing it is really drowned out though)
customer_reviews.author: Jackie A. Beechner

customer_reviews.title: better for most types of music
customer_reviews.text: yah, ,bought them as a back up to my crystal clear Bose 'Bututh', the Sony is quite 'bassie', better for most types of music, the N Bose are better for movies and voice, but I wish there was away to adjust the Sony bass down a bit; 30 hr battery life is great, it reduces 'charge' anxiety; quality is good,you'll like them.
customer_reviews.author: vvurdsmyth

customer_reviews.title: Another great quality product from Sony
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Sony products since time immemorial. They have never let me down through all the years. Their products are exceptionally made and well designed. The Extra Bass wireless headphone is no exception. It is quietly elegant and very pleasing to the ears. I have been using the set for hours and can never get tired of it. Another great quality product from Sony!
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: Bummer!
customer_reviews.text: I was super pumped when my wife came home with these guys. Pairing was a breeze, sound quality good, controls very accessible and easy to operate......BUT.....after two business trips (2 werks) the right speaker began to rattle and mix in a static noise which makes them useless. Bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Sstone

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I could never understand why people paid over 100 dollars for headphones, but now I get it. the sound quality is amazing and the app lets you control the sound is a game-changer. If you buy these I challenge you to play Frank Sinatra, on the concert setting in the app and you will be impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter Mack

product_meta.title: Sony MDRXB650BT/L Extra Bass Bluetooth Headphones, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BlueLet your music loose with the powerful, clear sound of EXTRA BASS and freedom of Bluetooth connectivity that lets you cut the cord, while pumping it up in style. Never miss a beat with 30mm drivers engineered for today's bass-heavy tracks and up to 30 hours of battery life. Even take hands-free calls. They're ready to hit the streets with bass that hits. Frequency Response: 20 Hz–20,000 Hz; Volume Sensor: Yes
feature_bullets: Connect and stream music easily with Bluetooth and NFC. Connectivity Technology: Wireless
Direction of In-Line Microphone Omnidirectional microphone.Feel the powerful, clear sound of EXTRA BASS
Keep the music pumping with up to 30 hours of battery life
Listen in comfort and style with cushioned ear pads
Enjoy hands-free calls with a built-in mic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars3,446 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #1,021 in On-Ear Headphones#1,563 in Over-Ear Headphones
